start.text: Stop right there. Your valuables or your life. Make a choice.

choices.text: Take what you want, just don't hurt me.

positive_response.text: A wise choice indeed. Now, hand it all over, and maybe you'll walk away from this.

neutral_response.text: Liar! Everyone has something. I'll just take it from your corpse.

hostile_response.text: Big words. Let's see if you can back them up.

end.text: Don't let me see you again.
